sentences.sContent: Gandhi was accused by some of trying to appease both factions of the electorate.
sentences.sCn: 甘地被一些人指责试图对两派选民都加以姑息。

synos.tran: 使平息；使满足；使和缓；对…让步

words.tran: 缓和得了的；劝解得了的；平息得了的

trans.tranCn: 使平息；使满足；使和缓；对…让步
trans.tranOther: If you try to appease someone, you try to stop them from being angry by giving them what they want
